# The `TileInfo` Struct Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

A helper struct to create IR loop nests for tiling in IR of the following form: for ColumnLoop.Index = 0..NumColumns for RowLoop.Index = 0..NumRows for KLoop.Index = 0..NumInner. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>struct llvm::TileInfo</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

A helper struct to create IR loop nests for tiling in IR of the following form: for ColumnLoop.Index = 0..NumColumns for RowLoop.Index = 0..NumRows for KLoop.Index = 0..NumInner.

Definition at line 31 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/utils/matrixutils-h">MatrixUtils.h</a>.

## Public Member Functions

### CreateTiledLoops() {#a8547d158fd9eb8e0cb27673ac3034a1c}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>BasicBlock &#42; TileInfo::CreateTiledLoops (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42; Start, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42; End, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase">IRBuilderBase</a> &amp; B, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/domtreeupdater">DomTreeUpdater</a> &amp; DTU, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopinfo">LoopInfo</a> &amp; LI)</>}>
Creates an IR loop nests for tiling of the form below.

Returns the block for the inner loop body and sets &#123;Column,Row,Inner&#125;LoopHeader/Latch fields.

for ColumnLoop.Index = 0..NumColumns for RowLoop.Index = 0..NumRows for InnerLoop.Index = 0..NumInner

## Private Static Functions

### CreateLoop() {#a7f4198a66aa15f9f616af5b00d2dc1eb}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>BasicBlock &#42; TileInfo::CreateLoop (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42; Preheader, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42; Exit, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42; Bound, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42; Step, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Name, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase">IRBuilderBase</a> &amp; B, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/domtreeupdater">DomTreeUpdater</a> &amp; DTU, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42; L, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopinfo">LoopInfo</a> &amp; LI)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Creates a new loop with header, body and latch blocks that iterates from &#91;0, Bound).

Updates <code>Preheader</code> to branch to the new header and uses <code>Exit</code> as exit block. Adds the new loop blocks to \\L and applies dominator tree updates to <code>DTU</code>.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/utils/matrixutils-h/#l00082">82</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/utils/matrixutils-h">MatrixUtils.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/matrixutils-cpp/#l00023">23</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/matrixutils-cpp">MatrixUtils.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
